sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_62500_mealplan_recipe"> <x_62500_mealplan_recipe action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <cook_time>1970-01-01 00:45:00</cook_time> <cooking_instructions>1. Preheat oven to 375Â°F (190Â°C). 2. Cook lasagna noodles according to package instructions. 3. Slice zucchini, yellow squash, and carrots thinly. 4. In a skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. 5. Add minced garlic and cook until fragrant. 6. Add sliced vegetables and spinach, cook until tender. 7. In a baking dish, layer cooked lasagna noodles with tomato sauce, cooked vegetables, ricotta cheese, and shredded mozzarella cheese. 8. Repeat layers, ending with a layer of noodles and sauce on top. 9. Sprinkle grated parmesan cheese and Italian seasoning on top. 10. Cover with foil and bake for 25-30. 11. Remove foil and bake for an additional 10, until cheese is bubbly and golden. 12. Let it cool slightly before serving.</cooking_instructions> <cuisine display_value="Italian">4f495a179791021069a3b6fce053afce</cuisine> <diet>bca1c6979711021069a3b6fce053af90</diet> <effort display_value="Moderate">bee0a76e9730021069a3b6fce053af3e</effort> <image/> <ingredients>Lasagna Noodles (8), Tomato Sauce (2 cup</ingredients> <meal_type display_value="Dinner">ca8516df9751021069a3b6fce053afdf</meal_type> <name>Vegetable Lasagna</name> <nutrition>Calories: 400, Protein: 20g, Fat: 15g, Carbs: 45g</nutrition> <owned_by display_value="MP Admin">cbb877e697b0021069a3b6fce053af41</owned_by> <pre_cook>false</pre_cook> <prep_instructions>1. Cook lasagna noodles. 2. Slice zucchini, yellow squash, and carrots. 3. Cook spinach. 4. Mince garlic.</prep_instructions> <prep_required>false</prep_required> <prep_time>1970-01-01 00:30:00</prep_time> <serving>2</serving> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-04-07 01:00:29</sys_created_on> <sys_id>34ac87979795021069a3b6fce053afa6</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-05-01 06:39:10</sys_updated_on> <time_of_day/> </x_62500_mealplan_recipe> </record_update>
